etymology.value: From Greek poikilos meaning 'varied' or 'spotted' and meros meaning 'part' or 'segment'.

usage_notes.explanation: This term is highly specialized and used primarily within the field of zoology when discussing the segmented body structure of poecilothermic (cold-blooded) animals.

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly technical term used in zoology. It is unlikely to be encountered outside of specialized scientific literature. Understanding requires knowledge of both zoology and Greek root words.
